message: Let's be fair, 60% for me is a good deal!
Your share depreciates much faster than mine, Alice. Let's be realistic and split 45/55.
I'll take a bit less, but 58% is as low as I'll go for now.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Every round costs us both money.  I'm at 48/52 - take it or leave it.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Alice, I'm offering you a larger share than what you'd get if you reject this and win the next round. Don't be greedy, this is your best shot.
